alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 8:59PM CST until January 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Whisky Chitto Creek...including Mittie...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Vermilion River...including Carencro, Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 900 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes near Eunice. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.8 feet, IT IS ESTIMATED THAT 18 STRUCTURES NEAR THE BAYOU WILL BE FLOODED. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 1.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 19.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 1.6 Tue 8 pm CST 13.0 18.9 17.8 &&
